TreeRoot.deskripsi: Bruised and Scratch on left hand
TreeRoot.path: [["Bruised and Scratch on left hand","Driller broke connection with Grapper Top Drive while the Hawk jaws attached to Drill Pipe String","Grabber dies slipped, drill string rotated to left, hawk-jaws hit IP1 who pushed IP1. They fell on rig floor","The Crew fail to clear the non essential personnel from the rig floor before break connection"],["Bruised and Scratch on left hand","Driller broke connection with Grapper Top Drive while the Hawk jaws attached to Drill Pipe String","Grabber dies slipped, drill string rotated to left, hawk-jaws hit IP1 who pushed IP1. They fell on rig floor","Incorrect positioning of the iron roughneck whilst attempting to break connection."],["Bruised and Scratch on left hand","Driller broke connection with Grapper Top Drive while the Hawk jaws attached to Drill Pipe String","Took risk to operate the top drive while actually there other operated equipment which was iron roughneck attached at one drilling string. ","Procedure for breaking out over-torqued connection not adequate"]]

CellNode.deskripsi: Driller broke connection with Grapper Top Drive while the Hawk jaws attached to Drill Pipe String
Grabber dies slipped, drill string rotated to left, hawk-jaws hit IP1 who pushed IP1. They fell on rig floor
The Crew fail to clear the non essential personnel from the rig floor before break connection
Incorrect positioning of the iron roughneck whilst attempting to break connection.
Took risk to operate the top drive while actually there other operated equipment which was iron roughneck attached at one drilling string.
Procedure for breaking out over-torqued connection not adequate
